Title: Episode One
Plot: Rudy gets a rude awakening in his first few days of community service, learning that with the keys to the infamous locker room comes a great deal of running, screaming and, in some instances, killing. But that really is the least of his worries. More pressing is just how to keep his secret superpower, well, secret. Meanwhile the rest of the gang are trying to adapt to life with their new superpowers. But just how did the trade-off with Seth, the superpower dealer, go down?
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Director: Wayne Che Yip, Alex Garcia Lopez
